text_logic_form: Point $Z$ is the centroid of the triangle $RST$.
The length of the line $RZ$ is $18$ units.
Find the length of the line $SR$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $Z$ is the centroid of the triangle $RST$.
The length of the line $RZ$ is $18$ units.
Find the length of the line $SR$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $RW$ is $14$ units.
The length of the line $RZ$ is repeated as $18$ units.
The length of the line $UZ$ is $5$ units.
Point $Z$ lies on the line connecting $U$ and $S$.
Point $W$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $R$.
Point $V$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $T$.
Point $U$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $T$.
Point $Z$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $V$.
Point $Z$ also lies on the line connecting $T$ and $W$.
line_instances: There are lines $RT$, $RV$, $RW$, $RZ$, $SR$, $ST$, $SV$, $SW$, $SZ$, forming the triangle $RST$ and its medians.
